title: Clear customer info after quotation generation

requirements.text: Clear the customer name and mobile number input fields in the CustomerInfoForm component after the quotation PDF is successfully generated and printed

quotes: Clear customer name and mobile number after generate & print quotation

acceptanceCriteria: Customer name field is reset to empty after PDF generation
Mobile number field is reset to empty after PDF generation
Fields are only cleared after successful quotation generation, not on failure
The clearing happens automatically without requiring user action

requirements.text: Update App.tsx to reset customer data state after quotation generation, coordinating with the existing door entries clearing behavior
acceptanceCriteria: Customer data state in App.tsx is reset after successful quotation generation
Customer data clearing is coordinated with the existing door entries clearing mechanism
The CustomerInfoForm reflects the cleared state immediately

constraints: Do not modify the backend/main.mo file
Maintain the existing quotation generation flow in QuotationActions.tsx
Preserve the current PDF generation functionality
nonGoals: Clearing customer data on any action other than successful quotation generation
Storing customer history or previous customer data
